homeContent.title: Functional Art
homeContent.description: I create furniture pieces that blend functionality with artistic expression, using sustainable materials and traditional techniques.
homeContent.explore_text: Explore my collection of functional art works, each piece carefully crafted to capture the essence of light, color, and emotion.

aboutContent.title: About Me
aboutContent.bio: I am an artist currently based in [Location]. My work has been exhibited in galleries and shows, and I continue to develop my practice through exploration of various mediums and techniques.
